analysis.description:
SafeERC20.safeTransfer (/unique_chucks/43/0x8f3c8e59716427f3345f6d3b6ead596e99375227.sol#175-187) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(prevBalance - _value == _token.balanceOf(address(this)),Transfer failed)

SafeERC20.safeTransfer (/unique_chucks/43/0x8f3c8e59716427f3345f6d3b6ead596e99375227.sol#175-187) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(prevBalance - _value == _token.balanceOf(address(this)),Transfer failed)
SafeERC20.safeTransferFrom (/unique_chucks/43/0x8f3c8e59716427f3345f6d3b6ead596e99375227.sol#198-213) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(prevBalance - _value == _token.balanceOf(_from),Transfer failed)

SafeERC20.safeTransfer (/unique_chucks/43/0x8f3c8e59716427f3345f6d3b6ead596e99375227.sol#175-187) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/43/0x8f3c8e59716427f3345f6d3b6ead596e99375227.sol#185)

SafeERC20.safeTransferFrom (/unique_chucks/43/0x8f3c8e59716427f3345f6d3b6ead596e99375227.sol#198-213) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transferFrom(_from,_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/43/0x8f3c8e59716427f3345f6d3b6ead596e99375227.sol#211)

KyberConverter.transferred (/unique_chucks/43/0x8f3c8e59716427f3345f6d3b6ead596e99375227.sol#347-349) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_address.transfer(msg.sender,change) (/unique_chucks/43/0x8f3c8e59716427f3345f6d3b6ead596e99375227.sol)
